alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:40PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Gulf and southeastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Wakulla, central Gadsden, central Liberty, northwestern Jefferson, Leon Counties in Big Bend of Florida and south central Thomas Counties in south central Georgia through 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/... At 439 PM EDT/339 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Stonemill Creek to 7 miles northeast of Woodville. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florida State University, Quincy, Tallahassee Comm College, Tallahassee, Blountstown, Midway, Florida A and M, Havana, Woodville, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wewahitchka, Orange, Bristol, Lake Bradford, Alma, Cody, Jewel Fire Tower, Vilas, Florence and Chipola Cutoff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
